verses.text: \w Again|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w flying|strong="H5774"\w* \w scroll|strong="H4039"\w*.

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*?” \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w angel|strong="H5774"\w*. “\w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w flying|strong="H5774"\w* \w scroll|strong="H4039"\w*,” \w I|strong="H7200"\w* replied, “\w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* cubits \w long|strong="H4100"\w* \w and|strong="H6242"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* cubits \w wide|strong="H7341"\w*.\f + \fr 5:2 \ft The flying scroll was approximately 30 feet long and 15 feet wide (9.1 meters long and 4.6 meters wide).\f*”

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* told \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w curse|strong="H7650"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w side|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* scroll, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* thief \w will|strong="H2088"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w removed|strong="H3318"\w*; \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H2088"\w* \w side|strong="H2088"\w*, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* perjurer \w will|strong="H2088"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w removed|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w send|strong="H3318"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* enter \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w thief|strong="H1590"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w swears|strong="H7650"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. \w It|strong="H8432"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w remain|strong="H3885"\w* \w inside|strong="H8432"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3615"\w* \w it|strong="H8432"\w*, down \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w its|strong="H3318"\w* \w timbers|strong="H6086"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* stones.” The Vision of the Woman in a Basket

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w who|strong="H4397"\w* \w was|strong="H4397"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w forward|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*, “\w Now|strong="H4994"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* approaching.”

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*?” \w I|strong="H4100"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*. \w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* replied, “\w A|strong="H3068"\w* measuring basket \f + \fr 5:6 \ft Or An ephah\f* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w going|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*.” \w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* continued, “\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* iniquity \f + \fr 5:6 \ft One Hebrew manuscript, LXX, and Syriac; most Hebrew manuscripts their appearance or (literally) their eye\f* \w in|strong="H5869"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land.”

\w And|strong="H3427"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w cover|strong="H3603"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w lead|strong="H5777"\w* \w was|strong="H3427"\w* \w raised|strong="H5375"\w*, \w and|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w was|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w inside|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* basket.

“\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w Wickedness|strong="H7564"\w*,” \w he|strong="H6310"\w* \w said|strong="H6310"\w*. \w And|strong="H6310"\w* \w he|strong="H6310"\w* shoved \w her|strong="H2063"\w* \w down|strong="H7993"\w* \w into|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* basket, pushing \w down|strong="H7993"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w lead|strong="H5777"\w* cover \w over|strong="H8432"\w* \w its|strong="H7993"\w* \w opening|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* women approaching, \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H8064"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*. \w Their|strong="H5375"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* \w were|strong="H5869"\w* \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w those|strong="H2007"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stork|strong="H2624"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w they|strong="H2007"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* basket \w between|strong="H7307"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*.

“\w Where|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* taking \w the|strong="H1696"\w* basket?” \w I|strong="H3212"\w* \w asked|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* \w who|strong="H1992"\w* \w was|strong="H4397"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w*.

“\w To|strong="H5921"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Shinar|strong="H8152"\w*,\f + \fr 5:11 \ft That is, Babylonia\f*” \w he|strong="H8033"\w* told \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. “\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H8033"\w* \w ready|strong="H3559"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* basket \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w set|strong="H3559"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* pedestal.”
